name: Shunpei Kobayashi
body:
### Who am I
A mobile/web developer based on Tokyo, Japan. I have a background in physics and have some experiences in scientific computing.
I also spent quite some time studying and realizing object oriented design.

### What I do
I develop mobile/web apps based on clients' request, as well as my own interest.

### Works
Most of the apps for my clients are not public. Please contact me if you want informations about them.
One of the public works is the iOS port of novel game engine for [ten†cross](http://tencross.com).

### Contact
mail: skonb@me.com
